meanings.definition: The state or quality of being chilly.
meanings.sent1: The chilliness of the room made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the chilliness of the winter air on my skin.
meanings.sent3: Despite the chilliness, we still enjoyed our picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: The chilliness of her stare sent a shiver down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The chilliness of the lake water took my breath away.

meanings.sent1: She wrapped herself in a blanket to ward off the chilliness.
meanings.sent2: The chilliness of the ice cream gave me brain freeze.
meanings.sent3: The chilliness of the breeze made the leaves rustle in the trees.
meanings.sent4: The chilliness of the metal bench made sitting uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The chilliness of the morning air woke me up instantly.
